DOC.brief_summary: Dendritic cells vaccinations are increasingly used in order to develop antitumoral immune response. This will be a Phase 2 trial using autologous dendritic cells pulsed with leukemic apoptotic corpse in acute myelogenous leukemia (AML) patients in first or second Complete remission (CR).
DOC.brief_title: Vaccination by Leukemic Apoptotic Corpse Autologous Pulsed Dendritic Cells for Acute Myelogenous Leukemia (AML) Patients in First or Second Complete Remission (CR)(CD laM)
